meanings.definition: A plant that has seeds unprotected by an ovary or fruit.
meanings.sent1: The gymnosperm tree in the park drops its seeds on the ground.
meanings.sent2: I learned about gymnosperms in science class.
meanings.sent3: The gymnosperm seeds played hide-and-seek with the squirrels.
meanings.sent4: The gymnosperm stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The unique appearance of the gymnosperm made it easy to spot among the other plants.
